QuestData.Title: Totem of Coo
QuestData.Description: You begin to read the totem, barely able to pronounce the awkward words and phrases. Slowly, words start to form in your head. You think that the totem is telling you to go up the nearby hill, to the northeast.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the Totem of Coo using the clues provided to you.
QuestData.RewardText: The totem has various primal markings. You see owls, bears, wolves and stags carved into the surface of the totem.$B$BYou note a strange collection of symbols that makes your mouth form the word C-O-O.
